00021 #ifndef CO_COMMANDS_H
00022 #define CO_COMMANDS_H
00023 
00024 #include <lunchbox/bitOperation.h> // byteswap inline impl
00025 
00026 namespace co
00027 {
00028 
00033 enum CommandType
00034 {
00035     COMMANDTYPE_NODE, 
00036     COMMANDTYPE_OBJECT, 
00037     COMMANDTYPE_CUSTOM = 1<<7, // !< Application-specific command
00038     COMMANDTYPE_INVALID = 0xFFFFFFFFu 
00039 };
00040 
00041 enum Commands
00042 {
00043     CMD_NODE_CUSTOM = 50,  
00044     CMD_NODE_MAXIMUM = 0xFFFFFFu, 
00045     CMD_OBJECT_CUSTOM = 10, 
00046     CMD_INVALID = 0xFFFFFFFFu 
00047 };
00048 
00050 static const size_t COMMAND_MINSIZE = 256;
00051 
00053 static const size_t COMMAND_ALLOCSIZE = 4096; // Bigger than minSize!
00054 }
00055 
00056 namespace lunchbox
00057 {
00058 template<> inline void byteswap( co::CommandType& value )
00059     { byteswap( reinterpret_cast< uint32_t& >( value )); }
00060 }
00061 
00062 #endif // CO_COMMANDS_H
